verses.verse: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show unto his servants, even the things which must shortly come to pass: and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John;

who <S%G3739><s%> bare witness <S%G3140><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, even <S%G5037><s%> of all things that <S%G3745><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%>.

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that readeth <S%G314><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they that hear <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> the things that are written <S%G1125><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%>: <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is at hand <S%G1451><s%>.

John <S%G2491><s%> to the <S%G1577><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> him who is <S%G5607><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who was <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who is to come <S%G2064><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, who is the faithful <S%G4103><s%> witness <S%G3144><s%>, the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>. Unto him that loveth <S%G25><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> loosed <S%G3068><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to be a kingdom <S%G935><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> to be priests <S%G2409><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>; to him <S%G846><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dominion <S%G2904><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, he cometh <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the clouds <S%G3507><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they that <S%G3748><s%> pierced <S%G1574><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the tribes <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall mourn <S%G2875><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. Even so <S%G3483><s%>, Amen <S%G281><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the Alpha <S%G1><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Omega <S%G5598><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G5607><s%>, who is and <S%G2532><s%> who was <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who is to come <S%G2064><s%>, the Almighty <S%G3841><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> partaker <S%G4791><s%> with you in <S%G1722><s%> the tribulation <S%G2347><s%> and2532, 1722 kingdom <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> which are in <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the isle <S%G3520><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Patmos <S%G3963><s%>, for <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and2532, 1223 the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

I was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> Lord <S%G2960><s%>'s day <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of a trumpet <S%G4536><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G3739><s%> thou seest <S%G991><s%>, write <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> a book <S%G975><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> it to the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%>: unto <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Smyrna <S%G4667><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Pergamum <S%G4010><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Sardis <S%G4554><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Philadelphia <S%G5359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Laodicea <S%G2993><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I turned <S%G1994><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> that <S%G3748><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> having turned <S%G1994><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden candlesticks <S%G5552><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the <S%G2033><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> one like <S%G3664><s%> unto a son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, clothed <S%G1746><s%> with a garment down to the foot <S%G4158><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> girt <S%G4024><s%> about <S%G4314><s%> at the breasts <S%G3149><s%> with a golden <S%G5552><s%> girdle <S%G2223><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his hair <S%G2359><s%> were white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> white wool <S%G2053><s%>, white <S%G3022><s%> as snow <S%G5510><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were as <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G1161><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto burnished brass <S%G5474><s%>, as if <S%G5613><s%> it had been refined <S%G4448><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a furnace <S%G2575><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of <S%G5204><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> proceeded <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> countenance <S%G3799><s%> was as <S%G5613><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> shineth <S%G5316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> strength <S%G1411><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, I fell <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one dead <S%G3498><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he laid <S%G2007><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, <S%G3427><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>; I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> the Living <S%G2198><s%> one <S%G2532><s%>; and I was <S%G1096><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> evermore <S%G165><s%>, <S%G281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> the keys <S%G2807><s%> of death <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Hades <S%G86><s%>.

Write <S%G1125><s%> therefore the things which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> come to pass1096, 3326 hereafter <S%G5023><s%>;

the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%>. The seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> candlesticks3087, 3739, 1492 are <S%G1526><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%>.
